nodes.text: Kalandis Seven's spaceport was the primary spaceport of the planet Kalandis Seven.

In 3640 BBY during the Galactic War the Resurgent Sith Empire invaded the planet Kalandis Seven. Some time after the Imperials withdrew from Corellia, the Galactic Republic sent a squad of Republic troopers led by Sergeant Shanra Immel, and advised by Republic Special Forces Division Colonel Jace Malcom were tasked with the destruction of this spaceport. During their mission a Sith Planetary command ship landed to refuel. Malcom revised their mission to include capturing the command ship. However Malcom was not successful in the capture of the command ship, but the troopers under Immel were successful at destroying the spaceport.

The spaceport was first mentioned in The Essential Reader's Companion released on October 2, 2012. The spaceport first appeared within the pages of Alexander Freed's short story "The Last Battle of Colonel Jace Malcom" which was released on October 23 inside Star Wars Insider 137.
